The (unofficial) Apple Commercial Playlist

While I was following a Wikipedia rathole on random night, I came across an article documenting the songs used in various Apple product commercials. After not finding a similarly-themed play list on Spotify, I dedided to create one myself. Three ours later, I had a good chunk of the music noted on the Wikipedia post added to a Spotify playlist.

As the original Wikipedia article has since been removed, this information is now compiled from AppleMusic.info.
